subject: Football
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: As Rutgers prepares for a season that is to begin on Monday against Fresno State, starting quarterback Mike Teel says he feels fine after suffering a broken right hand during last season.
snippet: As Rutgers prepares for a season that is to begin on Monday against Fresno State, starting quarterback Mike Teel says he feels fine after suffering a broken right hand during last season.
